nodes.text: Bright Tuash was a legendary figure in the religion of the Keshiri species of the planet Kesh. Bright Tuash had avian characteristics and was an ally of Adari Vaal, who was herself revered as the Herald. When the Lost Tribe of Sith made first contact with the Keshiri of the continent Alanciar, the Sith leader, a Human named Varner Hilts, wore an avian costume and claimed to be Bright Tuash.
